title: Kylie Jenner gets reflective with throwback bikini snap after Travis Scott split
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner was feeling in a reflective mood following the demise of her relationship with Travis Scott.

The Lip Kit mogul took to Instagram to share a throwback bikini snap with her daughter Stormi Webster, who she shares with the rapper as she looked back on the past year.

The sweet mother-daughter moment captured the two of them on holiday, with Kylie showering her daughter in kisses.

Kylie, 22, was clad in an eye-popping neon bikini that featured very high waisted bottoms to show off her stunning curves.

"About a year ago with my baby," wrote a newly single Kylie in her caption. "Where does the time go..."

Stormi, now one, looked adorable in the picture in a white bathing suit and straw hat.

Kylie is currently dealing with the break up from Stormi's dad Travis Scott.

The pair are said to have split in September with Kylie releasing a statement to Twitter confirming to fans they were still on great terms.

(Image: Getty Images for The Met Museum/)

"Our friendship and our daughter is priority," she added.

A source claimed this week that their relationship had been on the rocks for a while.

Speaking to Heat magazine, the insider said: "Kylie clung on to this relationship as long as she could. Things hadn’t been good for a while, but she was so sure they could work things out."

(Image: Instagram)

Since the split, Kylie treated herself to a $3 million Bugatti Chiron.

She took to Instagram posed by another of her motors this week in a post that many fans claimed was very similar to one shard by her ex Tyga.

Fans have been keeping a close eye on the couple since Kylie was spotted heading to his recording studio last week.

(Image: Instagram)

Eagle-eyed followers of Tyga noticed that he was wearing on his feet a pair of Nike trainers from Travis Scott's collection that many saw as a dig at Travis.

Kylie and Tyga broke up in 2017 and she coupled up with Travis some months after after they met at Coachella Festival.
description: Kylie Jenner split with her boyfriend of two years and the father of her daughter Stormi, Travis Scott last month
authors: Getty Images For The Met Museum
